extendedInfo.description: Keep your little ones safe with the British Red Crossâ Baby and Child First Aid app. Packed with useful videos, easy to follow advice and a test section â itâs absolutely free and simple to download.Also features a Hospital finder and a handy device enabling parents to record their childâs medication needs. Get this essential app on your Android device now.LEARNSimple, easy-to-understand advice and frequently asked questions on 17 first aid scenarios. Videos, step-by-step instructions and animations make it fun and easy to pick up.PREPAREGet expert tips on how to prepare for some of the most common emergency situations, from accidents in the garden to a fire at home. Sections include a list of tips and handy checklist.EMERGENCYAct fast when things go wrong. This instantly accessible, step-by-step section gives you the key information to know what to do in emergency first aid situations. TESTFind out how much youâve learned in our test section, which provides a useful opportunity to check that youâve picked up all the necessary skills. INFOFind out more about the life-saving work of the British Red Cross â including volunteering opportunities, latest news and how to sign up for a first aid course. Download this essential app today.* Note that while emergency numbers throughout the app are for UK users, the information in this app will be useful to anyone, anywhere in the world.

reviews.title: Still happening after recent update
reviews.comment: I haven\'t fully explored the app, I had gone to the choking section for under 1 and as I scrolled down it froze and crashed! I have tried it many times, turned my phone off and on, deleted the app and reinstalled it but no joy!  Please fix that stability issue.
reviews.author: Damian Booth

reviews.title: Could be difficult to use in an emergency
reviews.comment: Some of the text is in grey: in an emergency situation this could be hard to read. Suggest rework to make text clearer. When people are panicky they don\'t want to struggle to read the instructions!
reviews.author: Jerry Fox

reviews.title: crashed
reviews.comment: crashes on virtually every page on a Samsung S3.  great idea but useless if crashes all the time when you try to use it. fix and I will change the score.
reviews.author: Jamie Brown

reviews.title: Disappointing!
reviews.comment: I imagine this would be a brilliant and very useful app, if it didn\'t crash on every page I try to read through!! Please fix it!!!
reviews.author: Joanne Jannaway

reviews.title: Baby and Child First Aid (Red Cross)
reviews.comment: This app is very good if you have a child
reviews.author: Jack Ely

reviews.title: A LIFE SAVER!!
reviews.comment: Superbly simple to use. I recommend this app to all my customers who attend my BRC First Aid courses!
reviews.author: Zoe Orman

reviews.title: Missing Hospital
reviews.comment: M41 nearest hospital missing from list  :(
reviews.author: Andy Rowland

reviews.title: Could save a life
reviews.comment: How many apps can you say that about?
reviews.author: John Thomas

reviews.comment: Usefull app
reviews.author: Nix On

reviews.title: Useful, simple and very clear
reviews.comment: This app has been done really well. The graphic is excellent, the explanations are clear and simple. Thank you.
reviews.author: Giulia Garzilli

reviews.title: Keeps crashing
reviews.comment: App keeps crashing. ..reload and it crashes again and again! My issue is also within the choking under 1\'s
reviews.author: Jess Leeson

reviews.title: First time to use app
reviews.comment: (Less than one star, but had to click one to leave feedback) Failed three attempts to view highlighted info. Therefore rendering me to find alternative sources as this app not reliable
reviews.author: Petra Miles

reviews.comment: Any help to save a life deserves 5 stars
reviews.author: Dean Owen

reviews.title: Best app.ever
reviews.comment: Anything that gives.you.skills.to.save a.life is.awesome..
reviews.author: Daniel Robinson-Smith

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: All parents should have this one their devices.
reviews.author: Stef Hodgson

reviews.title: Really great!
reviews.comment: Useful advice. Great info. Fabulous app.

reviews.comment: Brilliant

reviews.title: Won\'t start
reviews.comment: Can\'t open it. Just says its stopped

reviews.title: Works great now
reviews.comment: Cant open app. After contact with developer app now works great. All very well set out.

reviews.title: Not able to download
reviews.comment: When I try to download this it comes up package file invalid which is really disappointing as the app would come in very handy and I have the adult one.
